title: Uniswap v3 liquidity migration Pt.5
body:
As outlined in [this](https://forum.mstable.org/t/mdp21-1-migration-of-dai-mta-liquidity-on-uniswap-v2-to-v3/471) forum post, the release of Uniswap v3 means that the mStableDAO should consider migrating liquidity it has on v2 to v3. This motion specifically refers to liquidity in DAI/MTA that was contributed by the DAO after being ratified [here](https://snapshot.org/#/mstable/proposal/QmNeVEhg8rd2pNqgpVkd4xQfKsQSVffyB7KV3QjAJEwyiK) by Meta Governors. 

The DAO must now decide on different parameters the LP contribution will use, as ratified by [this](https://snapshot.org/#/mstabledao.eth/proposal/Qmf4GYTsnNwCzyDcLjbXAPZWWaCwYQPuMv3Te9vRt419m2) vote.

Each parameter will be ratified in a separate vote for more expressivity, and this vote is concerned with the upper end of the liquidity position.

**What should the upper end on the DAI/MTA liquidity position on Uniswap v3 be set to?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
